name: Feoh the Fitter
description:
Feoh the Fitter is a puzzle grid game designed to test your spatial awareness and allow you to explore the rules of the game.  If you like thinky puzzle games like sokobond or a good snowman is hard to build you may enjoy this game. 

Contact:

If you have any questions, run into any issues or just want to say hello, the best email is media@feohthefitter.com

Credits:

Music by Robert Marsh

Art by Kenny Art Assets

Sound Effects from Zapsplat.com
